hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc #Check if published version is already present in repo package_name="redis" published_version="4.0.8"
available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) PRETTY_NAME="Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 6.9 (Santiago)"
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo for $PRETTY_NAME." echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Available version: $available_version" echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi
# Install dependencies sudo yum install -y gcc gcc-c++ make which git tcl
#Get the source code git clone git://github.com/antirez/redis.git cd redis git checkout 4.0.8
# Build redis make
# Run the testcases make test
# Install the redis sudo make install
# Start server redis-server &
sleep 10s
# Verification if [ $(redis-cli ping) != "PONG" ] || [ $(redis-cli set foo bar) != "OK" ] || [ $(redis-cli get foo) != "bar" ]; then exit 1 fi
